entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
